text: janara palige, avara pritipatrarada mahileyaru, putraru, cinna mattu belliya rasigalu, bare eleda (palagisida) kuduregalu, saku pranigalu mattu vyavasayada jaminugalu â€“ ivugalannella candaganisalagide. Adare ivella kevala ihalokada badukina sadhanagalu. Nijakku atyuttama neleyu allahana bali ide
